body: Discordant Note (Sonic), Energy Resistance (Body), Enhance Form (Body), Gloom (Illumination), Moderate Cure (Healing), Moderate Wound (Wounding), Paralyze Humanoid (Binding), Predict (Time), Sense Alignment* (Detection), Sense Hidden (Detection), Servitor II (Summoning), Suppress (Dispelling), Undeath (Death)
